explains: n. 上演；分段运输；脚手架；乘驿马车的旅行
v. 表演；展现；分阶段进行；筹划（stage 的 ing 形式）
wordGroup: staging area 集结待命地区

sentences.en: The local theatre group is staging a production of 'Hamlet'.
sentences.cn: 当地剧团在上演《哈姆雷特》。

sentences.en: Five other cities had been competing for the honour of staging the Games.
sentences.cn: 另外五个城市一直在为赢得该运动会的举办权而相互竞争。

sentences.en: Members of an environmental group are staging a protest inside a chemical plant.
sentences.cn: 一个环保团体的成员们正在一家化工厂内进行抗议。
